Text:
Just wanted to let you all know that
Dance Of The Dawn (studio run-through)
and Giants Under The Sun (studio run-through) were not on the original album but were included as part of the 2003 Rhino reissue as bonus tracks.

The actual order of the album is:

DISC ONE
01 The Revealing Science of God (Dance of the Dawn)
02 The Remembering (High the Memory)

DISC TWO
03 The Ancient (Giants Under the Sun)
04 Ritual (Nous Sommes Du Soleil)
05 Dance Of The Dawn (studio run-through)
06 Giants Under The Sun (studio run-through)

Enjoy!

@all: this is "joannellis" - due to some strange login/profile issue, i will now be operating under this new username of "anssetfair." 

hope to get you some more good uploads soon!

peace,
joann
